testcase.name: Then Oracle and Cloud Sign In panel must be stacked
Given user is logged in Oracle account
Then user name and heading Oracle account must be displayed
Given user is logged in Oracle account​
Then User verify Oracle account must have links:
Scenario: Accounts - Oracle Account links verify

testcase.name: Given user is logged in Oracle account​​
Then User verify Oracle signin must have links:
Given user has contact in the nav
When user clicks on the link
Then panel must show Regions in the 1st panel and their countries in the 2nd panel
Then based on country site pin must appear against it
Scenario: Show regions and its countries

testcase.name: Given user is on the OCOM page
Then menu must appear on the left of the Oracle Badge
When user clicks on a link
Then user must navigate to that page
When user hovers over menu icon
Given user clicked in the search field
When user begins to type keyword 'ora'
When user clicks outside the search field
Then autosuggest must retract

testcase.name: When user selects an option and clickssearch icon
Then results must be displayed on Oracle search page
Given user is on the OCOM page​
Then Search text must be followed with a search icon
When user clicks on the search icon
Then text search and cursor must appear in the field
When user clicks away from search field
Then search must show inactive state
Then user must navigate to site search page
